text: (leejie suniye) vah kashtee (jisamen mainne suraakh kar diya tha) to chand gareebon kee thee jo dariya mein mehanat karake guzaara karate the mainne chaaha ki use aibadaar bana doon (kyonki) unake peechhe-peechhe ek (zaalim) baadashaah (aata) tha ki tamaam kashtiyaan zabaradastee begaar mein pakad leta tha
